Hi,

I'm not sure which heritrix version you are using but in 1.14.3 you can 
do this using DecidingScope and MatchesRegExpDecideRule with regexp like

http://www.SITENAME/.*/TAG/.*

or maybe

http://www.SITENAME/.*/TAG/.*\.html?$

depending on what you want to achieve.

But as far as I understand it is also important how links to these HTML 
are gathered during the crawl. Most probably they are found inside other 
  HTML documents which won't be matched by the regexps above. This 
should be addressed somehow.

Regards,
Sergey
